scripts.prepare: set-defaults .vscode && forge install --no-git foundry-rs/forge-std@v1.8.0 safe-global/safe-smart-account@v1.4.1 || echo ''
scripts.start: zellij --layout zellij.kdl a template-redprint || zellij --layout zellij.kdl -s template-redprint
scripts.watch_test: as-soon -w script -w src -w test pnpm test
scripts.deploy_0_safe: DEPLOYMENT_CONTEXT=localhost ldenv -m localhost forge script script/000_DeploySafe.s.sol --private-key @@DEPLOYER_PRIVATE_KEY --rpc-url @@RPC_URL_:DEPLOYMENT_CONTEXT,RPC_URL --broadcast
scripts.deploy_0_proxy: DEPLOYMENT_CONTEXT=localhost ldenv -m localhost forge script script/000_DeployProxyAdmin.s.sol --debug --private-key @@DEPLOYER_PRIVATE_KEY --rpc-url @@RPC_URL_:DEPLOYMENT_CONTEXT,RPC_URL --broadcast
scripts.deploy_0_token: DEPLOYMENT_CONTEXT=localhost ldenv -m localhost forge script  script/000_DeployToken.s.sol:TesttokenScript   --private-key @@DEPLOYER_PRIVATE_KEY --rpc-url @@RPC_URL_:DEPLOYMENT_CONTEXT,RPC_URL --broadcast ~~ forge-deploy sync ~~ @@
